---
title: "NBA points"
output: html_notebook
---

## packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(smmr)
```

read in data

```{r}
nba=read_excel("../workshop-stats/NBAPoints.xls")
nba
write_csv(nba,"nbapoints.csv")
```

t-test

```{r}
t.test(nba$Points,mu=183.2,alternative="greater")
```

sign test

```{r}
sign_test(nba,Points,183.2)
```

visual

```{r}
ggplot(nba,aes(x=Points))+geom_histogram(bins=6)
```

normal quantile

```{r}
ggplot(nba,aes(sample=Points))+stat_qq()+stat_qq_line()
```

```{r}
ggplot(nba,aes(x=1,y=Points))+geom_boxplot()
```
